text:
Are you also offering content writing? From my experience in many cases the article might need a total rewrite.

I believe that you should bundle all your optimizations per article. People care about the end results. Then when you create your pricing plans you could sell different packages depending how how many articles you optimize.

e.g

Plan 1
1 Article/month

Plan 2
3 Articles/month

Plan 3
5 Articles/month

Then you can offer the initial audit for free or a very low price for the foot in the door to land the retainer.

Recurring income is waaay better than a one time payment project.

text: <@U01RSA9E9D4> not at all. Content does tons of things. But that answer was specific to your question around Seo/content.
